comments:
Existing RC1 project, opened fine in the clean version of I20040611...

Selected a block of code and pressed delete and all sorts of heck broke loose. 
Then Eclipse became unresponsive and had to be killed. This happened 
repeatedly, not just a one-off

Two different exceptions in the .log file, both suffixed with the NPE trace 
below - "Unhandled event loop exception" and "*** SWT nested exception"

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 0 Jun 11, 2004 14:37:01.633
